main event: Radar observed an unidentified object traveling extremely fast and making sharp turns in Dagmar, Montana on September 28, 1963.
interesting points: The unidentified target was tracked over a distance of approximately 20-25 miles in about 15 minutes., The object exhibited extreme speed and maneuverability, making tracking difficult., No known aircraft were identified in the area according to air traffic control radar., The observation included both ground and radar data., A civilian report mentioned a light on the ground that climbed high until it disappeared.
witness description: Civilians from Dagmar, Montana, with unknown ages and occupations.
